extension.name: Logo Module
extension.author: Selim Rana
extension.description: This module show your logo. developed by bdthemes ltd.

field.name: logo
field.label: MOD_BDTHEMES_LOGO_LOGO
field.description: Select your picture which you want to show for this logo

field.name: ratina_logo
field.label: Ratina Logo
field.description: If you want ratina logo so please add your logo-name@2x.png at same place where you keep the main logo file, so when you select Yes it will load the @2x logo on ratina display device automazically.

field.name: logo_custom_url
field.label: Logo Custom URL
field.description: If you want to add any Custom URL for your logo you can add from here. Otherwise if you take empty this text box, then logo's link will be default root url in your site.

field.name: logo_margin
field.label: Logo Margin
field.description: Select your margin which you want to show for this logo

field.name: logo_padding
field.label: Logo Padding
field.description: Select your padding which you want to show for this logo

field.name: logo_height
field.label: Logo Height
field.description: Select your logo height which you want to set for logo area

field.name: logo_auto_width
field.label: Auto Width
field.description: If you checked here, automatic adjust your logo width.

field.name: logo_alt_text
field.label: Logo Alt Text
field.description: You can set logo alternate text from here.

field.name: logo_custom_css
field.label: Logo Custom CSS
field.description: You can set custom CSS for logo from here.

field.name: has_infocard
field.label: Info Card
field.description: If you want info card with hover so you need to enable it and write your info card text on bellow text box.

field.name: card_margin
field.label: Card Margin
field.description: Select your margin which you want to show for this logo

field.name: infocard_text
field.label: Info Card Text
field.description: Info card text which show when you hover the logo on your site.

field.name: infocard_text_note
field.label: Info Card Text Notice
field.description: You can insert any HTML tag here but keep in mind you must need to know how html work or how to write html.
